#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000
long long power(long long a,long long b)
{
	if(b==0)
	return 1;
	long long p=power(a,b/2);
	if(b&1)
	return (a*p%MOD*p)%MOD;
	return (p%MOD*p)%MOD;
}


int main()
{
	long long  a,b;
	cin>>a>>b;
	while(a!=0 && b!=0)
	{
		cout<<power(a,b)<<endl;
		cin>>a>>b;
	}
	
}
